ComicInfo.Summary:
The Harbinger renegades return home, and Peter and Kris cope with the loss of their baby. But, after weeks of adventure, are the kids prepared to make it in the real world? And, here in their first appearance, a rocky night out with the agents of H.A.R.D. Corps!
Back from the Unity Conflict, the kids are stalked by the H.A.R.D. Corps, who want to add Pete's rare Omega Power to their database of Harbinger powers. Unaware of their pursuit, the kids meet a latent Harbinger named Shatiqua, who wants nothing to do with them. But when Pete turns back an attack by the H.A.R.D. Corps, Shatiqua begins to realize that her safety may depend upon these superhuman strangers!
1st H.A.R.D.Corps:
Gunslinger, Shakespeare, Maniac.
1st Shatiqua.
